Opioid crisis & its effect on the economy:
-$25.9B lost from decrease in productivity
-2.5-3M addicted to opioids
-12M chronic opioid users
-32.4M touched by opioids 
-1/5 of decline in male labor force participation due to opioids

This is a problem largely created by the medical industry over-prescribing.

4 out of 5 new heroin users started out misusing prescription painkillers.
